synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Gave turquoise crystals up to dimensions of 80 mm.

synthesis_conditions.treatment: with dry pyridine (py), followed by washing with dichloromethane
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Green derivative, x-ray diffraction pattern similar to HKUST-1.
Isostructural with HKUST-1, contains axial aqua ligands but contain channel DMF/DMSO and water.

synthesis_conditions.method: Hydrothermally similar to the synthesis of HKUST-1
